caption:
This photograph depicts an outdoor setting where two figures are present. On the left, there's a large, caricature-style inflatable figure. This figure has overly exaggerated features, with a white and pink color scheme. It features a distorted face with makeup and a pale complexion, a bulbous nose, pink cheeks, and projecting eyelashes. The figure wears a dress-like costume adorned with golden touches and a necklace, a top hat on its head, and has outstretched arms, possibly simulating a dance or dynamic pose.

On the right, a woman is seated beside this inflatable figure. She appears to be enjoying the scene, possibly watching a street performance or public event. The woman has long, straight brown hair, sunglasses, and is wearing a dark blue, casual outfit with a patterned cloth over one shoulder, typical of 1970s fashion.

The background suggests this scene takes place in a public, possibly urban, area filled with trees and possibly other onlookers or street furniture, though these elements are somewhat obscured and out of focus. The lighting indicates it's a sunny day, contributing to the vibrancy of the colors in the image.
title: August brings the "D'aug Days" to Fountain Square. "D'aug Days" is a month-long festival of arts presented to, for, and sometimes by, the people. This piece of "sewn sculpture" was carried through the downtown streets, attracting the curious to the square.
